trait.name: Age
trait.text: Kor mature at the same rate as humans and live about as long.

trait.name: Alignment
trait.text: Most kor are lawful good, with a strong dedication to community and the traditions of their ancestors.

trait.name: Size
trait.text: Kor average nearly 6 feet tall, but are much lighter and more slender than humans. Your size is Medium.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Climbing
trait.text: You also have a climbing speed of 30 feet as long as you are not encumbered or wearing heavy armor.

trait.name: Kor Climbing
trait.text: You have proficiency in the Athletics and Acrobatics skills.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You can speak, read, and write Common, and communicate in the silent speech of the Kor.

trait.name: Lucky
trait.text: When you roll a 1 on the d20 for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.
